document_data.name: Nera Muirreste
document_data.mainbody: '''Nera Muirreste''' was the wife of [[Elvath Muirreste]].
document_data.History: In [[1374 DR]], after Elvath's death in the [[Battle of the Cwm]], [[Seiveril Miritar]] went to visit Nera in order to tell her how her husband died valorously.
